attributes.action: Require the bbc to return a significant profit to those who've paid ever-increasing licence fees over many years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let's have the name(s) of the minister(s)who determine the ever-increasing bbc licence fee. The bbc certainly doesn't warrant public service status. The bbc should be made to compete with other tv organisations, without continuing subsidy and should be made to return a significant profit, to every legitimate licence fee payer of the last 12 years. By the way, I don't know which "category" to select because I don't know which government organisation has been responsible for the bbc's excecess.
